item.description: Use “shift + mouse wheel” to zoom without moving the page Top View # Full Screen function setup_svg_panzoom(){ let params = { panEnabled: true, zoomEnabled: true, dblClickZoomEnabled: true, controlIconsEnabled: false, mouseWheelZoomEnabled: true, preventMouseEventsDefault: true, zoomScaleSensitivity: 0.6, minZoom: 0.5, maxZoom: 4, fit: true , contain: true , center: true , refreshRate: 'auto' }; let svg_pz = svgPanZoom('#svg-b64f3224e691b250' ,params); window["svg_b64f3224e691b250"] = svg_pz let button = document.getElementById("btn-b64f3224e691b250"); button.onclick = ()={ var elem = document.
